product_name: The North Face Stormy Trail Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When weather takes a turn for the worse on your run, The North Face Stormy Trail women's jacket delivers waterproof, windproof, highly breathable protection, and dries fast so you stay comfortable. Shell features FlashDry(TM) technology, dramatically improving dry time and breathability. Waterproof, breathable laminate keeps you dry in foul weather; droptail hem cinches to prevent riding up. Zip chest pocket holds keys, ID and a gel; reflective elements help keep you visible. The North Face Stormy Trail jacket for women stows easily, making it perfect, packable emergency weather protection. Closeout.
short_description: When weather takes a turn for the worse on your run, The North Face Stormy Trail women's jacket delivers waterproof, windproof, highly breathable protection, and dries fast so you stay comfortable.
